DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study examine effect dapagliflozin electronic measure heart beat healthy male
DOC.brief_title: Effects Single Oral Dose Dapagliflozin QT Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male age 18 45 year age , currently take medication Normal screen result include physical examination , laboratory test , heart rate , blood pressure , ECG ( electronic measure heart ) No personal family history significant heart problem No use counter medication within 7 day study No use prescription medicaiton within 1 month study
